text: I have two codecov things, one that works and one that doesn't `codecov/patch — 0.00% of diff hit (target 2.85%)`. How do I get rid of the one that doesn't? <https://github.com/SciML/SciMLBase.jl/pull/24>

elements.text: I have two codecov things, one that works and one that doesn't
. How do I get rid of the one that doesn't?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/54818| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!

you can try playing with the threshold values: <https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/BinaryBuilder.jl/blob/6d069e216b324186b664ea22feb55747c363ebd6/codecov.yml>

otherwise you should be able to turn off completely the patch check with
```patch: no```
